title: SarifLog
description: Static Analysis Results Format (SARIF) Version 2.1.0 JSON Schema: a standard format for the output of static analysis tools.

$schema.title: $Schema
$schema.description: The URI of the JSON schema corresponding to the version.

version.description: The SARIF format version of this log file.

runs.title: Runs
runs.description: The set of runs contained in this log file.

inlineExternalProperties.title: Inlineexternalproperties
inlineExternalProperties.description: References to external property files that share data between runs.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the log file.

Version.title: Version
Version.description: The SARIF format version of this log file.

PropertyBag.title: PropertyBag
PropertyBag.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the object.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: A set of distinct strings that provide additional information.

MultiformatMessageString.title: MultiformatMessageString
MultiformatMessageString.description: A message string or message format string rendered in multiple formats.

text.title: Text
text.description: A plain text message string or format string.

markdown.title: Markdown
markdown.description: A Markdown message string or format string.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the message.

Level.title: Level
Level.description: A value specifying the severity level of the notification.

ReportingConfiguration.title: ReportingConfiguration
ReportingConfiguration.description: Information about a rule or notification that can be configured at runtime.

enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: Specifies whether the report may be produced during the scan.

level.description: Specifies the failure level for the report.

rank.title: Rank
rank.description: Specifies the relative priority of the report. Used for analysis output only.

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.description: Contains configuration information specific to a report.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the reporting configuration.

ToolComponentReference.title: ToolComponentReference
ToolComponentReference.description: Identifies a particular toolComponent object, either the driver or an extension.

name.title: Name
name.description: The 'name' property of the referenced toolComponent.

index.title: Index
index.description: An index into the referenced toolComponent in tool.extensions.

guid.title: Guid
guid.description: The 'guid' property of the referenced toolComponent.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the toolComponentReference.

ReportingDescriptorReference.title: ReportingDescriptorReference
ReportingDescriptorReference.description: Information about how to locate a relevant reporting descriptor.

index.title: Index
index.description: The index into an array of descriptors in toolComponent.ruleDescriptors, toolComponent.notificationDescriptors, or toolComponent.taxonomyDescriptors, depending on context.

guid.title: Guid
guid.description: A guid that uniquely identifies the descriptor.

toolComponent.title: Toolcomponent
toolComponent.description: A reference used to locate the toolComponent associated with the descriptor.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the reporting descriptor reference.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Encapsulates a message intended to be read by the end user.

arguments.title: Arguments
arguments.description: An array of strings to substitute into the message string.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the message.

ReportingDescriptorRelationship.title: ReportingDescriptorRelationship
ReportingDescriptorRelationship.description: Information about the relation of one reporting descriptor to another.

target.title: Target
target.description: A reference to the related reporting descriptor.

kinds.title: Kinds
kinds.description: A set of distinct strings that categorize the relationship. Well-known kinds include 'canPrecede', 'canFollow', 'willPrecede', 'willFollow', 'superset', 'subset', 'equal', 'disjoint', 'relevant', and 'incomparable'.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the reporting descriptor relationship.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the reporting descriptor reference.

ReportingDescriptor.title: ReportingDescriptor
ReportingDescriptor.description: Metadata that describes a specific report produced by the tool, as part of the analysis it provides or its runtime reporting.

id.title: Id
id.description: A stable, opaque identifier for the report.

deprecatedIds.title: Deprecatedids
deprecatedIds.description: An array of stable, opaque identifiers by which this report was known in some previous version of the analysis tool.

guid.title: Guid
guid.description: A unique identifer for the reporting descriptor in the form of a GUID.

deprecatedGuids.title: Deprecatedguids
deprecatedGuids.description: An array of unique identifies in the form of a GUID by which this report was known in some previous version of the analysis tool.

name.title: Name
name.description: A report identifier that is understandable to an end user.

deprecatedNames.title: Deprecatednames
deprecatedNames.description: An array of readable identifiers by which this report was known in some previous version of the analysis tool.

shortDescription.title: Shortdescription
shortDescription.description: A concise description of the report. Should be a single sentence that is understandable when visible space is limited to a single line of text.

fullDescription.title: Fulldescription
fullDescription.description: A description of the report. Should, as far as possible, provide details sufficient to enable resolution of any problem indicated by the result.

messageStrings.title: Messagestrings
messageStrings.description: A set of name/value pairs with arbitrary names. Each value is a multiformatMessageString object, which holds message strings in plain text and (optionally) Markdown format. The strings can include placeholders, which can be used to construct a message in combination with an arbitrary number of additional string arguments.

helpUri.title: Helpuri
helpUri.description: A URI where the primary documentation for the report can be found.

help.title: Help
help.description: Provides the primary documentation for the report, useful when there is no online documentation.

relationships.title: Relationships
relationships.description: An array of objects that describe relationships between this reporting descriptor and others.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the report.

ArtifactLocation.title: ArtifactLocation
ArtifactLocation.description: Specifies the location of an artifact.

uri.title: Uri
uri.description: A string containing a valid relative or absolute URI.

uriBaseId.title: Uribaseid
uriBaseId.description: A string which indirectly specifies the absolute URI with respect to which a relative URI in the "uri" property is interpreted.

index.title: Index
index.description: The index within the run artifacts array of the artifact object associated with the artifact location.

description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of the artifact location.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the artifact location.

TranslationMetadata.title: TranslationMetadata
TranslationMetadata.description: Provides additional metadata related to translation.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name associated with the translation metadata.

fullName.title: Fullname
fullName.description: The full name associated with the translation metadata.

shortDescription.title: Shortdescription
shortDescription.description: A brief description of the translation metadata.

fullDescription.title: Fulldescription
fullDescription.description: A comprehensive description of the translation metadata.

downloadUri.title: Downloaduri
downloadUri.description: The absolute URI from which the translation metadata can be downloaded.

informationUri.title: Informationuri
informationUri.description: The absolute URI from which information related to the translation metadata can be downloaded.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the translation metadata.

ToolComponent.title: ToolComponent
ToolComponent.description: A component, such as a plug-in or the driver, of the analysis tool that was run.

guid.title: Guid
guid.description: A unique identifer for the tool component in the form of a GUID.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the tool component.

organization.title: Organization
organization.description: The organization or company that produced the tool component.

product.title: Product
product.description: A product suite to which the tool component belongs.

productSuite.title: Productsuite
productSuite.description: A localizable string containing the name of the suite of products to which the tool component belongs.

shortDescription.title: Shortdescription
shortDescription.description: A brief description of the tool component.

fullDescription.title: Fulldescription
fullDescription.description: A comprehensive description of the tool component.

fullName.title: Fullname
fullName.description: The name of the tool component along with its version and any other useful identifying information, such as its locale.

version.title: Version
version.description: The tool component version, in whatever format the component natively provides.

semanticVersion.title: Semanticversion
semanticVersion.description: The tool component version in the format specified by Semantic Versioning 2.0.

dottedQuadFileVersion.title: Dottedquadfileversion
dottedQuadFileVersion.description: The binary version of the tool component's primary executable file expressed as four non-negative integers separated by a period (for operating systems that express file versions in this way).

releaseDateUtc.title: Releasedateutc
releaseDateUtc.description: A string specifying the UTC date (and optionally, the time) of the component's release.

downloadUri.title: Downloaduri
downloadUri.description: The absolute URI from which the tool component can be downloaded.

informationUri.title: Informationuri
informationUri.description: The absolute URI at which information about this version of the tool component can be found.

globalMessageStrings.title: Globalmessagestrings
globalMessageStrings.description: A dictionary, each of whose keys is a resource identifier and each of whose values is a multiformatMessageString object, which holds message strings in plain text and (optionally) Markdown format. The strings can include placeholders, which can be used to construct a message in combination with an arbitrary number of additional string arguments.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: An array of reportingDescriptor objects relevant to the notifications related to the configuration and runtime execution of the tool component.

rules.title: Rules
rules.description: An array of reportingDescriptor objects relevant to the analysis performed by the tool component.

taxa.title: Taxa
taxa.description: An array of reportingDescriptor objects relevant to the definitions of both standalone and tool-defined taxonomies.

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: An array of the artifactLocation objects associated with the tool component.

language.title: Language
language.description: The language of the messages emitted into the log file during this run (expressed as an ISO 639-1 two-letter lowercase language code) and an optional region (expressed as an ISO 3166-1 two-letter uppercase subculture code associated with a country or region). The casing is recommended but not required (in order for this data to conform to RFC5646).

contents.description: The kinds of data contained in this object.

isComprehensive.title: Iscomprehensive
isComprehensive.description: Specifies whether this object contains a complete definition of the localizable and/or non-localizable data for this component, as opposed to including only data that is relevant to the results persisted to this log file.

localizedDataSemanticVersion.title: Localizeddatasemanticversion
localizedDataSemanticVersion.description: The semantic version of the localized strings defined in this component; maintained by components that provide translations.

minimumRequiredLocalizedDataSemanticVers.title: Minimumrequiredlocalizeddatasemanticversion
minimumRequiredLocalizedDataSemanticVers.description: The minimum value of localizedDataSemanticVersion required in translations consumed by this component; used by components that consume translations.

associatedComponent.title: Associatedcomponent
associatedComponent.description: The component which is strongly associated with this component. For a translation, this refers to the component which has been translated. For an extension, this is the driver that provides the extension's plugin model.

translationMetadata.title: Translationmetadata
translationMetadata.description: Translation metadata, required for a translation, not populated by other component types.

supportedTaxonomies.title: Supportedtaxonomies
supportedTaxonomies.description: An array of toolComponentReference objects to declare the taxonomies supported by the tool component.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the tool component.

Tool.title: Tool
Tool.description: The analysis tool that was run.

driver.title: Driver
driver.description: The analysis tool that was run.

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.description: Tool extensions that contributed to or reconfigured the analysis tool that was run.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the tool.

ConfigurationOverride.title: ConfigurationOverride
ConfigurationOverride.description: Information about how a specific rule or notification was reconfigured at runtime.

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: Specifies how the rule or notification was configured during the scan.

descriptor.title: Descriptor
descriptor.description: A reference used to locate the descriptor whose configuration was overridden.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the configuration override.

Address.title: Address
Address.description: A physical or virtual address, or a range of addresses, in an 'addressable region' (memory or a binary file).

absoluteAddress.title: Absoluteaddress
absoluteAddress.description: The address expressed as a byte offset from the start of the addressable region.

relativeAddress.title: Relativeaddress
relativeAddress.description: The address expressed as a byte offset from the absolute address of the top-most parent object.

length.title: Length
length.description: The number of bytes in this range of addresses.

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: An open-ended string that identifies the address kind. 'data', 'function', 'header','instruction', 'module', 'page', 'section', 'segment', 'stack', 'stackFrame', 'table' are well-known values.

name.title: Name
name.description: A name that is associated with the address, e.g., '.text'.

fullyQualifiedName.title: Fullyqualifiedname
fullyQualifiedName.description: A human-readable fully qualified name that is associated with the address.

offsetFromParent.title: Offsetfromparent
offsetFromParent.description: The byte offset of this address from the absolute or relative address of the parent object.

index.title: Index
index.description: The index within run.addresses of the cached object for this address.

parentIndex.title: Parentindex
parentIndex.description: The index within run.addresses of the parent object.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the address.

ArtifactContent.title: ArtifactContent
ArtifactContent.description: Represents the contents of an artifact.

text.title: Text
text.description: UTF-8-encoded content from a text artifact.

binary.title: Binary
binary.description: MIME Base64-encoded content from a binary artifact, or from a text artifact in its original encoding.

rendered.title: Rendered
rendered.description: An alternate rendered representation of the artifact (e.g., a decompiled representation of a binary region).

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the artifact content.

Region.title: Region
Region.description: A region within an artifact where a result was detected.

startLine.title: Startline
startLine.description: The line number of the first character in the region.

startColumn.title: Startcolumn
startColumn.description: The column number of the first character in the region.

endLine.title: Endline
endLine.description: The line number of the last character in the region.

endColumn.title: Endcolumn
endColumn.description: The column number of the character following the end of the region.

charOffset.title: Charoffset
charOffset.description: The zero-based offset from the beginning of the artifact of the first character in the region.

charLength.title: Charlength
charLength.description: The length of the region in characters.

byteOffset.title: Byteoffset
byteOffset.description: The zero-based offset from the beginning of the artifact of the first byte in the region.

byteLength.title: Bytelength
byteLength.description: The length of the region in bytes.

snippet.title: Snippet
snippet.description: The portion of the artifact contents within the specified region.

message.title: Message
message.description: A message relevant to the region.

sourceLanguage.title: Sourcelanguage
sourceLanguage.description: Specifies the source language, if any, of the portion of the artifact specified by the region object.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the region.

PhysicalLocation.title: PhysicalLocation
PhysicalLocation.description: A physical location relevant to a result. Specifies a reference to a programming artifact together with a range of bytes or characters within that artifact.

region.title: Region
region.description: Specifies a portion of the artifact.

contextRegion.title: Contextregion
contextRegion.description: Specifies a portion of the artifact that encloses the region. Allows a viewer to display additional context around the region.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the physical location.

LogicalLocation.title: LogicalLocation
LogicalLocation.description: A logical location of a construct that produced a result.

name.title: Name
name.description: Identifies the construct in which the result occurred. For example, this property might contain the name of a class or a method.

index.title: Index
index.description: The index within the logical locations array.

fullyQualifiedName.title: Fullyqualifiedname
fullyQualifiedName.description: The human-readable fully qualified name of the logical location.

decoratedName.title: Decoratedname
decoratedName.description: The machine-readable name for the logical location, such as a mangled function name provided by a C++ compiler that encodes calling convention, return type and other details along with the function name.

parentIndex.title: Parentindex
parentIndex.description: Identifies the index of the immediate parent of the construct in which the result was detected. For example, this property might point to a logical location that represents the namespace that holds a type.

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: The type of construct this logical location component refers to. Should be one of 'function', 'member', 'module', 'namespace', 'parameter', 'resource', 'returnType', 'type', 'variable', 'object', 'array', 'property', 'value', 'element', 'text', 'attribute', 'comment', 'declaration', 'dtd' or 'processingInstruction', if any of those accurately describe the construct.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the logical location.

LocationRelationship.title: LocationRelationship
LocationRelationship.description: Information about the relation of one location to another.

target.title: Target
target.description: A reference to the related location.

kinds.title: Kinds
kinds.description: A set of distinct strings that categorize the relationship. Well-known kinds include 'includes', 'isIncludedBy' and 'relevant'.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the location relationship.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the location relationship.

Location.title: Location
Location.description: A location within a programming artifact.

id.title: Id
id.description: Value that distinguishes this location from all other locations within a single result object.

logicalLocations.title: Logicallocations
logicalLocations.description: The logical locations associated with the result.

message.title: Message
message.description: A message relevant to the location.

annotations.title: Annotations
annotations.description: A set of regions relevant to the location.

relationships.title: Relationships
relationships.description: An array of objects that describe relationships between this location and others.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the location.

StackFrame.title: StackFrame
StackFrame.description: A function call within a stack trace.

location.title: Location
location.description: The location to which this stack frame refers.

module.title: Module
module.description: The name of the module that contains the code of this stack frame.

threadId.title: Threadid
threadId.description: The thread identifier of the stack frame.

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.description: The parameters of the call that is executing.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the stack frame.

Stack.title: Stack
Stack.description: A call stack that is relevant to a result.

message.title: Message
message.description: A message relevant to this call stack.

frames.title: Frames
frames.description: An array of stack frames that represents a sequence of calls, rendered in reverse chronological order, that comprise the call stack.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the stack.

Error.title: Error
Error.description: Describes a runtime exception encountered during the execution of an analysis tool.

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: A string that identifies the kind of exception, for example, the fully qualified type name of an object that was thrown, or the symbolic name of a signal.

message.title: Message
message.description: A message that describes the exception.

stack.title: Stack
stack.description: The sequence of function calls leading to the exception.

innerErrors.title: Innererrors
innerErrors.description: An array of exception objects each of which is considered a cause of this exception.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the exception.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Describes a condition relevant to the tool itself, as opposed to being relevant to a target being analyzed by the tool.

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: The locations relevant to this notification.

message.title: Message
message.description: A message that describes the condition that was encountered.

level.description: A value specifying the severity level of the notification.

threadId.title: Threadid
threadId.description: The thread identifier of the code that generated the notification.

timeUtc.title: Timeutc
timeUtc.description: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time at which the analysis tool generated the notification.

exception.title: Exception
exception.description: The runtime exception, if any, relevant to this notification.

descriptor.title: Descriptor
descriptor.description: A reference used to locate the descriptor relevant to this notification.

associatedRule.title: Associatedrule
associatedRule.description: A reference used to locate the rule descriptor associated with this notification.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the notification.

Invocation.title: Invocation
Invocation.description: The runtime environment of the analysis tool run.

commandLine.title: Commandline
commandLine.description: The command line used to invoke the tool.

arguments.title: Arguments
arguments.description: An array of strings, containing in order the command line arguments passed to the tool from the operating system.

responseFiles.title: Responsefiles
responseFiles.description: The locations of any response files specified on the tool's command line.

startTimeUtc.title: Starttimeutc
startTimeUtc.description: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time at which the run started. See "Date/time properties" in the SARIF spec for the required format.

endTimeUtc.title: Endtimeutc
endTimeUtc.description: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time at which the run ended. See "Date/time properties" in the SARIF spec for the required format.

ruleConfigurationOverrides.title: Ruleconfigurationoverrides
ruleConfigurationOverrides.description: An array of configurationOverride objects that describe rules related runtime overrides.

notificationConfigurationOverrides.title: Notificationconfigurationoverrides
notificationConfigurationOverrides.description: An array of configurationOverride objects that describe notifications related runtime overrides.

toolExecutionNotifications.title: Toolexecutionnotifications
toolExecutionNotifications.description: A list of runtime conditions detected by the tool during the analysis.

toolConfigurationNotifications.title: Toolconfigurationnotifications
toolConfigurationNotifications.description: A list of conditions detected by the tool that are relevant to the tool's configuration.

exitCodeDescription.title: Exitcodedescription
exitCodeDescription.description: The reason for the process exit.

exitSignalName.title: Exitsignalname
exitSignalName.description: The name of the signal that caused the process to exit.

exitSignalNumber.title: Exitsignalnumber
exitSignalNumber.description: The numeric value of the signal that caused the process to exit.

processStartFailureMessage.title: Processstartfailuremessage
processStartFailureMessage.description: The reason given by the operating system that the process failed to start.

executionSuccessful.title: Executionsuccessful
executionSuccessful.description: Specifies whether the tool's execution completed successfully.

machine.title: Machine
machine.description: The machine that hosted the analysis tool run.

account.title: Account
account.description: The account that ran the analysis tool.

processId.title: Processid
processId.description: The process id for the analysis tool run.

executableLocation.title: Executablelocation
executableLocation.description: An absolute URI specifying the location of the analysis tool's executable.

workingDirectory.title: Workingdirectory
workingDirectory.description: The working directory for the analysis tool run.

environmentVariables.title: Environmentvariables
environmentVariables.description: The environment variables associated with the analysis tool process, expressed as key/value pairs.

stdin.title: Stdin
stdin.description: A file containing the standard input stream to the process that was invoked.

stdout.title: Stdout
stdout.description: A file containing the standard output stream from the process that was invoked.

stderr.title: Stderr
stderr.description: A file containing the standard error stream from the process that was invoked.

stdoutStderr.title: Stdoutstderr
stdoutStderr.description: A file containing the interleaved standard output and standard error stream from the process that was invoked.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the invocation.

Conversion.title: Conversion
Conversion.description: Describes how a converter transformed the output of a static analysis tool from the analysis tool's native output format into the SARIF format.

tool.title: Tool
tool.description: A tool object that describes the converter.

invocation.title: Invocation
invocation.description: An invocation object that describes the invocation of the converter.

analysisToolLogFiles.title: Analysistoollogfiles
analysisToolLogFiles.description: The locations of the analysis tool's per-run log files.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the conversion.

VersionControlDetails.title: VersionControlDetails
VersionControlDetails.description: Specifies the information necessary to retrieve a desired revision from a version control system.

repositoryUri.title: Repositoryuri
repositoryUri.description: The absolute URI of the repository.

revisionId.title: Revisionid
revisionId.description: A string that uniquely and permanently identifies the revision within the repository.

branch.title: Branch
branch.description: The name of a branch containing the revision.

revisionTag.title: Revisiontag
revisionTag.description: A tag that has been applied to the revision.

asOfTimeUtc.title: Asoftimeutc
asOfTimeUtc.description: A Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time that can be used to synchronize an enlistment to the state of the repository at that time.

mappedTo.title: Mappedto
mappedTo.description: The location in the local file system to which the root of the repository was mapped at the time of the analysis.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the version control details.

Artifact.title: Artifact
Artifact.description: A single artifact. In some cases, this artifact might be nested within another artifact.

description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of the artifact.

parentIndex.title: Parentindex
parentIndex.description: Identifies the index of the immediate parent of the artifact, if this artifact is nested.

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: The offset in bytes of the artifact within its containing artifact.

length.title: Length
length.description: The length of the artifact in bytes.

roles.description: The role or roles played by the artifact in the analysis.

mimeType.title: Mimetype
mimeType.description: The MIME type (RFC 2045) of the artifact.

encoding.title: Encoding
encoding.description: Specifies the encoding for an artifact object that refers to a text file.

sourceLanguage.title: Sourcelanguage
sourceLanguage.description: Specifies the source language for any artifact object that refers to a text file that contains source code.

hashes.title: Hashes
hashes.description: A dictionary, each of whose keys is the name of a hash function and each of whose values is the hashed value of the artifact produced by the specified hash function.

lastModifiedTimeUtc.title: Lastmodifiedtimeutc
lastModifiedTimeUtc.description: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time at which the artifact was most recently modified. See "Date/time properties" in the SARIF spec for the required format.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the artifact.

Node.title: Node
Node.description: Represents a node in a graph.

id.title: Id
id.description: A string that uniquely identifies the node within its graph.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short description of the node.

location.title: Location
location.description: A code location associated with the node.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the node.

Edge.title: Edge
Edge.description: Represents a directed edge in a graph.

id.title: Id
id.description: A string that uniquely identifies the edge within its graph.

label.title: Label
label.description: A short description of the edge.

sourceNodeId.title: Sourcenodeid
sourceNodeId.description: Identifies the source node (the node at which the edge starts).

targetNodeId.title: Targetnodeid
targetNodeId.description: Identifies the target node (the node at which the edge ends).

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the edge.

Graph.title: Graph
Graph.description: A network of nodes and directed edges that describes some aspect of the structure of the code (for example, a call graph).

nodes.title: Nodes
nodes.description: An array of node objects representing the nodes of the graph.

edges.title: Edges
edges.description: An array of edge objects representing the edges of the graph.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the graph.

Kind.title: Kind
Kind.description: A value that categorizes results by evaluation state.

Importance.title: Importance
Importance.description: Specifies the importance of this location in understanding the code flow in which it occurs. The order from most to least important is "essential", "important", "unimportant". Default: "important".

index.title: Index
index.description: The index within the run.webRequests array of the request object associated with this result.

method.title: Method
method.description: The HTTP method. Well-known values are 'GET', 'PUT', 'POST', 'DELETE', 'PATCH', 'HEAD', 'OPTIONS', 'TRACE', 'CONNECT'.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the request.

WebResponse.title: WebResponse
WebResponse.description: Describes the response to an HTTP request.

index.title: Index
index.description: The index within the run.webResponses array of the response object associated with this result.

noResponseReceived.title: Noresponsereceived
noResponseReceived.description: Specifies whether a response was received from the server.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the response.

ThreadFlowLocation.title: ThreadFlowLocation
ThreadFlowLocation.description: A location visited by an analysis tool while simulating or monitoring the execution of a program.

index.title: Index
index.description: The index within the run threadFlowLocations array.

stack.title: Stack
stack.description: The call stack leading to this location.

kinds.title: Kinds
kinds.description: A set of distinct strings that categorize the thread flow location. Well-known kinds include 'acquire', 'release', 'enter', 'exit', 'call', 'return', 'branch', 'implicit', 'false', 'true', 'caution', 'danger', 'unknown', 'unreachable', 'taint', 'function', 'handler', 'lock', 'memory', 'resource', 'scope' and 'value'.

taxa.title: Taxa
taxa.description: An array of references to rule or taxonomy reporting descriptors that are applicable to the thread flow location.

module.title: Module
module.description: The name of the module that contains the code that is executing.

state.title: State
state.description: A dictionary, each of whose keys specifies a variable or expression, the associated value of which represents the variable or expression value. For an annotation of kind 'continuation', for example, this dictionary might hold the current assumed values of a set of global variables.

nestingLevel.title: Nestinglevel
nestingLevel.description: An integer representing a containment hierarchy within the thread flow.

executionOrder.title: Executionorder
executionOrder.description: An integer representing the temporal order in which execution reached this location.

executionTimeUtc.title: Executiontimeutc
executionTimeUtc.description: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time at which this location was executed.

importance.description: Specifies the importance of this location in understanding the code flow in which it occurs. The order from most to least important is "essential", "important", "unimportant". Default: "important".

webRequest.title: Webrequest
webRequest.description: A web request associated with this thread flow location.

webResponse.title: Webresponse
webResponse.description: A web response associated with this thread flow location.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the threadflow location.

ThreadFlow.title: ThreadFlow
ThreadFlow.description: Describes a sequence of code locations that specify a path through a single thread of execution such as an operating system or fiber.

id.title: Id
id.description: An string that uniquely identifies the threadFlow within the codeFlow in which it occurs.

message.title: Message
message.description: A message relevant to the thread flow.

initialState.title: Initialstate
initialState.description: Values of relevant expressions at the start of the thread flow that may change during thread flow execution.

immutableState.title: Immutablestate
immutableState.description: Values of relevant expressions at the start of the thread flow that remain constant.

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: A temporally ordered array of 'threadFlowLocation' objects, each of which describes a location visited by the tool while producing the result.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the thread flow.

CodeFlow.title: CodeFlow
CodeFlow.description: A set of threadFlows which together describe a pattern of code execution relevant to detecting a result.

message.title: Message
message.description: A message relevant to the code flow.

threadFlows.title: Threadflows
threadFlows.description: An array of one or more unique threadFlow objects, each of which describes the progress of a program through a thread of execution.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the code flow.

EdgeTraversal.title: EdgeTraversal
EdgeTraversal.description: Represents the traversal of a single edge during a graph traversal.

message.title: Message
message.description: A message to display to the user as the edge is traversed.

finalState.title: Finalstate
finalState.description: The values of relevant expressions after the edge has been traversed.

stepOverEdgeCount.title: Stepoveredgecount
stepOverEdgeCount.description: The number of edge traversals necessary to return from a nested graph.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the edge traversal.

GraphTraversal.title: GraphTraversal
GraphTraversal.description: Represents a path through a graph.

runGraphIndex.title: Rungraphindex
runGraphIndex.description: The index within the run.graphs to be associated with the result.

resultGraphIndex.title: Resultgraphindex
resultGraphIndex.description: The index within the result.graphs to be associated with the result.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of this graph traversal.

initialState.title: Initialstate
initialState.description: Values of relevant expressions at the start of the graph traversal that may change during graph traversal.

immutableState.title: Immutablestate
immutableState.description: Values of relevant expressions at the start of the graph traversal that remain constant for the graph traversal.

edgeTraversals.title: Edgetraversals
edgeTraversals.description: The sequences of edges traversed by this graph traversal.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the graph traversal.

GraphTraversal1.title: GraphTraversal1
GraphTraversal1.description: Represents a path through a graph.

SuppressionKind.title: SuppressionKind
SuppressionKind.description: A value that categorizes suppression type.

State.title: State
State.description: A string that indicates the state of the suppression.

Suppression.title: Suppression
Suppression.description: A suppression that is relevant to a result.

guid.title: Guid
guid.description: A stable, unique identifer for the suprression in the form of a GUID.

kind.description: A string that indicates where the suppression is persisted.

state.description: A string that indicates the state of the suppression.

justification.title: Justification
justification.description: A string representing the justification for the suppression.

location.title: Location
location.description: Identifies the location associated with the suppression.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the suppression.

BaselineState.title: BaselineState
BaselineState.description: The state of a result relative to a baseline of a previous run.

top.title: Top
top.description: The Y coordinate of the top edge of the rectangle, measured in the image's natural units.

left.title: Left
left.description: The X coordinate of the left edge of the rectangle, measured in the image's natural units.

bottom.title: Bottom
bottom.description: The Y coordinate of the bottom edge of the rectangle, measured in the image's natural units.

right.title: Right
right.description: The X coordinate of the right edge of the rectangle, measured in the image's natural units.

message.title: Message
message.description: A message relevant to the rectangle.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the rectangle.

Attachment.title: Attachment
Attachment.description: An artifact relevant to a result.

description.title: Description
description.description: A message describing the role played by the attachment.

regions.title: Regions
regions.description: An array of regions of interest within the attachment.

rectangles.title: Rectangles
rectangles.description: An array of rectangles specifying areas of interest within the image.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the attachment.

ResultProvenance.title: ResultProvenance
ResultProvenance.description: Contains information about how and when a result was detected.

firstDetectionTimeUtc.title: Firstdetectiontimeutc
firstDetectionTimeUtc.description: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time at which the result was first detected. See "Date/time properties" in the SARIF spec for the required format.

lastDetectionTimeUtc.title: Lastdetectiontimeutc
lastDetectionTimeUtc.description: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time at which the result was most recently detected. See "Date/time properties" in the SARIF spec for the required format.

firstDetectionRunGuid.title: Firstdetectionrunguid
firstDetectionRunGuid.description: A GUID-valued string equal to the automationDetails.guid property of the run in which the result was first detected.

lastDetectionRunGuid.title: Lastdetectionrunguid
lastDetectionRunGuid.description: A GUID-valued string equal to the automationDetails.guid property of the run in which the result was most recently detected.

invocationIndex.title: Invocationindex
invocationIndex.description: The index within the run.invocations array of the invocation object which describes the tool invocation that detected the result.

conversionSources.title: Conversionsources
conversionSources.description: An array of physicalLocation objects which specify the portions of an analysis tool's output that a converter transformed into the result.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the result.

Replacement.title: Replacement
Replacement.description: The replacement of a single region of an artifact.

deletedRegion.title: Deletedregion
deletedRegion.description: The region of the artifact to delete.

insertedContent.title: Insertedcontent
insertedContent.description: The content to insert at the location specified by the 'deletedRegion' property.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the replacement.

ArtifactChange.title: ArtifactChange
ArtifactChange.description: A change to a single artifact.

artifactLocation.title: Artifactlocation
artifactLocation.description: The location of the artifact to change.

replacements.title: Replacements
replacements.description: An array of replacement objects, each of which represents the replacement of a single region in a single artifact specified by 'artifactLocation'.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the change.

Fix.title: Fix
Fix.description: A proposed fix for the problem represented by a result object. A fix specifies a set of artifacts to modify. For each artifact, it specifies a set of bytes to remove, and provides a set of new bytes to replace them.

description.title: Description
description.description: A message that describes the proposed fix, enabling viewers to present the proposed change to an end user.

artifactChanges.title: Artifactchanges
artifactChanges.description: One or more artifact changes that comprise a fix for a result.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the fix.

Result.title: Result
Result.description: A result produced by an analysis tool.

ruleId.title: Ruleid
ruleId.description: The stable, unique identifier of the rule, if any, to which this notification is relevant. This member can be used to retrieve rule metadata from the rules dictionary, if it exists.

ruleIndex.title: Ruleindex
ruleIndex.description: The index within the tool component rules array of the rule object associated with this result.

rule.title: Rule
rule.description: A reference used to locate the rule descriptor relevant to this result.

kind.description: A value that categorizes results by evaluation state.

level.description: A value specifying the severity level of the result.

message.title: Message
message.description: A message that describes the result. The first sentence of the message only will be displayed when visible space is limited.

analysisTarget.title: Analysistarget
analysisTarget.description: Identifies the artifact that the analysis tool was instructed to scan. This need not be the same as the artifact where the result actually occurred.

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: The set of locations where the result was detected. Specify only one location unless the problem indicated by the result can only be corrected by making a change at every specified location.

guid.title: Guid
guid.description: A stable, unique identifer for the result in the form of a GUID.

correlationGuid.title: Correlationguid
correlationGuid.description: A stable, unique identifier for the equivalence class of logically identical results to which this result belongs, in the form of a GUID.

occurrenceCount.title: Occurrencecount
occurrenceCount.description: A positive integer specifying the number of times this logically unique result was observed in this run.

partialFingerprints.title: Partialfingerprints
partialFingerprints.description: A set of strings that contribute to the stable, unique identity of the result.

fingerprints.title: Fingerprints
fingerprints.description: A set of strings each of which individually defines a stable, unique identity for the result.

stacks.title: Stacks
stacks.description: An array of 'stack' objects relevant to the result.

codeFlows.title: Codeflows
codeFlows.description: An array of 'codeFlow' objects relevant to the result.

graphs.title: Graphs
graphs.description: An array of zero or more unique graph objects associated with the result.

graphTraversals.title: Graphtraversals
graphTraversals.description: An array of one or more unique 'graphTraversal' objects.

relatedLocations.title: Relatedlocations
relatedLocations.description: A set of locations relevant to this result.

suppressions.title: Suppressions
suppressions.description: A set of suppressions relevant to this result.

baselineState.description: The state of a result relative to a baseline of a previous run.

rank.title: Rank
rank.description: A number representing the priority or importance of the result.

attachments.title: Attachments
attachments.description: A set of artifacts relevant to the result.

hostedViewerUri.title: Hostedvieweruri
hostedViewerUri.description: An absolute URI at which the result can be viewed.

workItemUris.title: Workitemuris
workItemUris.description: The URIs of the work items associated with this result.

provenance.title: Provenance
provenance.description: Information about how and when the result was detected.

fixes.title: Fixes
fixes.description: An array of 'fix' objects, each of which represents a proposed fix to the problem indicated by the result.

taxa.title: Taxa
taxa.description: An array of references to taxonomy reporting descriptors that are applicable to the result.

webRequest.title: Webrequest
webRequest.description: A web request associated with this result.

webResponse.title: Webresponse
webResponse.description: A web response associated with this result.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the result.

RunAutomationDetails.title: RunAutomationDetails
RunAutomationDetails.description: Information that describes a run's identity and role within an engineering system process.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the identity and role played within the engineering system by this object's containing run object.

id.title: Id
id.description: A hierarchical string that uniquely identifies this object's containing run object.

guid.title: Guid
guid.description: A stable, unique identifer for this object's containing run object in the form of a GUID.

correlationGuid.title: Correlationguid
correlationGuid.description: A stable, unique identifier for the equivalence class of runs to which this object's containing run object belongs in the form of a GUID.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the run automation details.

ColumnKind.title: ColumnKind
ColumnKind.description: Specifies the unit in which the tool measures columns.

ExternalPropertyFileReference.title: ExternalPropertyFileReference
ExternalPropertyFileReference.description: Contains information that enables a SARIF consumer to locate the external property file that contains the value of an externalized property associated with the run.

location.title: Location
location.description: The location of the external property file.

guid.title: Guid
guid.description: A stable, unique identifer for the external property file in the form of a GUID.

itemCount.title: Itemcount
itemCount.description: A non-negative integer specifying the number of items contained in the external property file.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the external property file.

ExternalPropertyFileReferences.title: ExternalPropertyFileReferences
ExternalPropertyFileReferences.description: References to external property files that should be inlined with the content of a root log file.

conversion.title: Conversion
conversion.description: An external property file containing a run.conversion object to be merged with the root log file.

graphs.title: Graphs
graphs.description: An array of external property files containing a run.graphs object to be merged with the root log file.

externalizedProperties.title: Externalizedproperties
externalizedProperties.description: An external property file containing a run.properties object to be merged with the root log file.

artifacts.title: Artifacts
artifacts.description: An array of external property files containing run.artifacts arrays to be merged with the root log file.

invocations.title: Invocations
invocations.description: An array of external property files containing run.invocations arrays to be merged with the root log file.

logicalLocations.title: Logicallocations
logicalLocations.description: An array of external property files containing run.logicalLocations arrays to be merged with the root log file.

threadFlowLocations.title: Threadflowlocations
threadFlowLocations.description: An array of external property files containing run.threadFlowLocations arrays to be merged with the root log file.

results.title: Results
results.description: An array of external property files containing run.results arrays to be merged with the root log file.

taxonomies.title: Taxonomies
taxonomies.description: An array of external property files containing run.taxonomies arrays to be merged with the root log file.

addresses.title: Addresses
addresses.description: An array of external property files containing run.addresses arrays to be merged with the root log file.

driver.title: Driver
driver.description: An external property file containing a run.driver object to be merged with the root log file.

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.description: An array of external property files containing run.extensions arrays to be merged with the root log file.

policies.title: Policies
policies.description: An array of external property files containing run.policies arrays to be merged with the root log file.

translations.title: Translations
translations.description: An array of external property files containing run.translations arrays to be merged with the root log file.

webRequests.title: Webrequests
webRequests.description: An array of external property files containing run.requests arrays to be merged with the root log file.

webResponses.title: Webresponses
webResponses.description: An array of external property files containing run.responses arrays to be merged with the root log file.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the external property files.

SpecialLocations.title: SpecialLocations
SpecialLocations.description: Defines locations of special significance to SARIF consumers.

displayBase.title: Displaybase
displayBase.description: Provides a suggestion to SARIF consumers to display file paths relative to the specified location.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the special locations.

Run.title: Run
Run.description: Describes a single run of an analysis tool, and contains the reported output of that run.

tool.title: Tool
tool.description: Information about the tool or tool pipeline that generated the results in this run. A run can only contain results produced by a single tool or tool pipeline. A run can aggregate results from multiple log files, as long as context around the tool run (tool command-line arguments and the like) is identical for all aggregated files.

invocations.title: Invocations
invocations.description: Describes the invocation of the analysis tool.

conversion.title: Conversion
conversion.description: A conversion object that describes how a converter transformed an analysis tool's native reporting format into the SARIF format.

language.title: Language
language.description: The language of the messages emitted into the log file during this run (expressed as an ISO 639-1 two-letter lowercase culture code) and an optional region (expressed as an ISO 3166-1 two-letter uppercase subculture code associated with a country or region). The casing is recommended but not required (in order for this data to conform to RFC5646).

versionControlProvenance.title: Versioncontrolprovenance
versionControlProvenance.description: Specifies the revision in version control of the artifacts that were scanned.

originalUriBaseIds.title: Originaluribaseids
originalUriBaseIds.description: The artifact location specified by each uriBaseId symbol on the machine where the tool originally ran.

artifacts.title: Artifacts
artifacts.description: An array of artifact objects relevant to the run.

logicalLocations.title: Logicallocations
logicalLocations.description: An array of logical locations such as namespaces, types or functions.

graphs.title: Graphs
graphs.description: An array of zero or more unique graph objects associated with the run.

results.title: Results
results.description: The set of results contained in an SARIF log. The results array can be omitted when a run is solely exporting rules metadata. It must be present (but may be empty) if a log file represents an actual scan.

automationDetails.title: Automationdetails
automationDetails.description: Automation details that describe this run.

runAggregates.title: Runaggregates
runAggregates.description: Automation details that describe the aggregate of runs to which this run belongs.

baselineGuid.title: Baselineguid
baselineGuid.description: The 'guid' property of a previous SARIF 'run' that comprises the baseline that was used to compute result 'baselineState' properties for the run.

redactionTokens.title: Redactiontokens
redactionTokens.description: An array of strings used to replace sensitive information in a redaction-aware property.

defaultEncoding.title: Defaultencoding
defaultEncoding.description: Specifies the default encoding for any artifact object that refers to a text file.

defaultSourceLanguage.title: Defaultsourcelanguage
defaultSourceLanguage.description: Specifies the default source language for any artifact object that refers to a text file that contains source code.

newlineSequences.title: Newlinesequences
newlineSequences.description: An ordered list of character sequences that were treated as line breaks when computing region information for the run.

columnKind.description: Specifies the unit in which the tool measures columns.

externalPropertyFileReferences.title: Externalpropertyfilereferences
externalPropertyFileReferences.description: References to external property files that should be inlined with the content of a root log file.

threadFlowLocations.title: Threadflowlocations
threadFlowLocations.description: An array of threadFlowLocation objects cached at run level.

taxonomies.title: Taxonomies
taxonomies.description: An array of toolComponent objects relevant to a taxonomy in which results are categorized.

addresses.title: Addresses
addresses.description: Addresses associated with this run instance, if any.

translations.title: Translations
translations.description: The set of available translations of the localized data provided by the tool.

policies.title: Policies
policies.description: Contains configurations that may potentially override both reportingDescriptor.defaultConfiguration (the tool's default severities) and invocation.configurationOverrides (severities established at run-time from the command line).

webRequests.title: Webrequests
webRequests.description: An array of request objects cached at run level.

webResponses.title: Webresponses
webResponses.description: An array of response objects cached at run level.

specialLocations.title: Speciallocations
specialLocations.description: A specialLocations object that defines locations of special significance to SARIF consumers.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the run.

ExternalProperties.title: ExternalProperties
ExternalProperties.description: The top-level element of an external property file.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: The URI of the JSON schema corresponding to the version of the external property file format.

version.description: The SARIF format version of this external properties object.

guid.title: Guid
guid.description: A stable, unique identifer for this external properties object, in the form of a GUID.

runGuid.title: Runguid
runGuid.description: A stable, unique identifer for the run associated with this external properties object, in the form of a GUID.

conversion.title: Conversion
conversion.description: A conversion object that will be merged with a separate run.

graphs.title: Graphs
graphs.description: An array of graph objects that will be merged with a separate run.

externalizedProperties.title: Externalizedproperties
externalizedProperties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information that will be merged with a separate run.

artifacts.title: Artifacts
artifacts.description: An array of artifact objects that will be merged with a separate run.

invocations.title: Invocations
invocations.description: Describes the invocation of the analysis tool that will be merged with a separate run.

logicalLocations.title: Logicallocations
logicalLocations.description: An array of logical locations such as namespaces, types or functions that will be merged with a separate run.

threadFlowLocations.title: Threadflowlocations
threadFlowLocations.description: An array of threadFlowLocation objects that will be merged with a separate run.

results.title: Results
results.description: An array of result objects that will be merged with a separate run.

taxonomies.title: Taxonomies
taxonomies.description: Tool taxonomies that will be merged with a separate run.

driver.title: Driver
driver.description: The analysis tool object that will be merged with a separate run.

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.description: Tool extensions that will be merged with a separate run.

policies.title: Policies
policies.description: Tool policies that will be merged with a separate run.

translations.title: Translations
translations.description: Tool translations that will be merged with a separate run.

addresses.title: Addresses
addresses.description: Addresses that will be merged with a separate run.

webRequests.title: Webrequests
webRequests.description: Requests that will be merged with a separate run.

webResponses.title: Webresponses
webResponses.description: Responses that will be merged with a separate run.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the external properties.
